reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had three nights at the Hotel Salta in January and we loved it. Our room had a fabulous balcony overlooking the main square in Salta which meant we were able to watch the comings and goings of the city and admire the mountains, at all times of the day and night. It's a great location and pretty much everything was within walking distance.
reviews.title: Location, location, location

reviews.text: It's an old, traditional hotel that doesn't have the most modern decoration or furniture but is very clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: Great Hotel on the Ave 9 de Julio Square
Very Nice Hotel
reviews.text: Highly recommended and very good value.

reviews.title: Comfortable, nice character, great location
reviews.text: We originally wanted to book this Hotel when we planned our trip to visit Salta, Argentina (Dec 2007). This hotel was recommended from my Argentina Travel book. Unfortunately, the Hotel was fully booked and did not have any vacancies for the days we were going to be there.

reviews.title: Nice Hotel in a very nice colonial town
reviews.text: We searched online for another hotel and found the Shauard Hotel (or what we now call the Charade Hotel). Read my review on the Shauard (it's a horrible hotel - Tourist Beware). It was such a horrible experience, I had to blog it. http://www.urbanswirl.com/travel/hotel-horror---it-should-be-called-the-charade-23.html
